___updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___status.description: Three options in string format to describe status of the task

___list.description: The list this task belongs to

___parent_task.description: ID of another task that this task belongs to

___percentage_completed.description: Number out of 100 to represent how much of this task has been completed

___created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___due_date.description: Date and time the task is due in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

___priority_level.description: Priority level.  5 being the most important

____id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

___assignees.description: People whom this task has been assigned to
